description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the remote code execution vulnerability in the Microsoft WDAC OLE DB provider for SQL Server (CVE-2024-21352), apply the relevant update based on your Windows version:

1. Identify your Windows version and build number.
2. Download and install the appropriate update package from the links provided below.
3. Restart your system to apply the updates.

**Details**:
- The following update packages address this vulnerability:
  - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)
  - For Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)
  - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
  - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5034766](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034766)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running one of the specified Windows versions before applying the updates.
- Backup any critical data before proceeding with the installation.
